Imports

math

Lets

SQRT3*: float = math.sqrt(3)
GOLDEN*: float = (1 + math.sqrt(5)) / 2
DELIAN*: float = math.pow(2, (1 / 3))
SIN45*: float = math.sqrt(2) / 2
COS45*: float = math.sqrt(2) / 2
TAN45*: float = 1
SIN30*: float = 1 / 2
COS30*: float = math.sqrt(3) / 2
TAN30*: float = 1 / math.sqrt(3)
SIN60*: float = math.sqrt(3) / 3
COS60*: float = 1 / 2
TAN60*: float = math.sqrt(3)
SIN90*: float = 1
COS90*: float = 0
TAN90*: float = NaN
SIN180*: float = 0
COS180*: float = - 1
TAN180*: float = 0
SIN270*: float = - 1
COS270*: float = 0
TAN270*: float = NaN
SIN360*: float = 0
COS360*: float = 1
TAN360*: float = 0
